description:
💥🔫 Buckshot Roulette – Russian Roulette Simulator 🔫💥
😱 One shotgun. Two players. Four lives. Who will make it out alive?

Welcome to 🎲 Buckshot Roulette, the most intense, terrifying, and unpredictable luck-based horror game you've ever faced! Sit across from a creepy dealer in a dark, bone-chilling room where every choice could lead to 💀 death or 🔥 survival.

You're armed with a shotgun — but the real weapon is your nerve.
👉 Will you shoot yourself... or aim at the dealer?

🔧 GAMEPLAY FEATURES:

💣 Randomized shells – Know how many are loaded, but not where

🧍‍♂️ You vs. Dealer – Both start with 4 lives

🎯 Take your shot… and pray you don’t hear a BOOM

🧠 Quick decisions, high risk, and insane tension every round!

🧰 USE YOUR ITEMS (ONLY ONCE!):

🔍 Magnifying Glass – Peek into the current chamber

🚬 Cigarette – Smoke to recover 1 lost life
⚠️ But beware — the dealer can use them too!

🃏 BONUS HORROR BLACKJACK GAME!
Survive the shotgun standoff and you’ll unlock a bone-chilling twist – a nightmarish version of Blackjack with a horror theme! 👻💀 Can you win against a dealer who doesn't play by the rules?

🎯 PERFECT FOR:

🎮 Horror lovers

👁️ Fans of luck-based games

🕹️ Quick, high-stakes arcade thrill seekers

🤯 Players who love tension, suspense, and heart-pounding choices

🌟 WHY PLAY BUCKSHOT ROULETTE?

😈 Terrifyingly beautiful horror visuals

🔄 Fast, replayable matches full of twists

🎭 Unpredictable, strategic gameplay

🧨 A SHOTGUN instead of a revolver — way more intense!

📲 DOWNLOAD NOW and face the fear you never knew you had.
Every click could be your last…
Will you survive the blast — or join the list of the lost?

💥 Pull the trigger. Take the risk. Beat the dealer… if you dare. 💥
shortDescription:
Face the dealer in a terrifying game of chance with a loaded shotgun. 🎯 Choose to shoot yourself or the dealer — survive 4 deadly rounds using only your wits, a 🔍 magnifying glass, and a 🚬 cigarette. Includes a bone-chilling bonus game: Horror Blackjack! 👻
Do you feel lucky? 💀
title: Buckshot Roulette – Russian Roulette Simulator
